name: Malicious Script Execution Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook addresses the incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data and install backdoors.

action--1a65bfef-e1f3-4b7c-af7b-6f2f7651.name: Kill malicious process
action--1a65bfef-e1f3-4b7c-af7b-6f2f7651.description: Terminate any processes executing malicious scripts.

action--2e070b2d-6e7e-48ab-9ffc-57d7c7ee.name: Check for dropped payload files
action--2e070b2d-6e7e-48ab-9ffc-57d7c7ee.description: Remove any dropped files related to the payload.

while-condition--f0b64c5d-005f-4d63-820f.name: Check for remaining payload files
while-condition--f0b64c5d-005f-4d63-820f.description: Repeat until no more payload files are detected.

action--3d7b28e5-463b-478c-b81f-4ea48e0a.name: Disconnect from network
action--3d7b28e5-463b-478c-b81f-4ea48e0a.description: Take the host offline to prevent further communication.

action--e9c3b1d1-7f7c-472d-8095-fb6b5499.name: Run full system scan
action--e9c3b1d1-7f7c-472d-8095-fb6b5499.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the system to detect any remaining threats.

while-condition--3f9cea55-9a47-4418-9722.name: System scan until clean
while-condition--3f9cea55-9a47-4418-9722.description: Continue scanning until the system is deemed clean.
